verses.verse: <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to all <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H8085>"Behold,<s%> I have listened to your <S%H6963>voice<s%> in all that you <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4427>me,<s%> and have made a king over <S%H4428>you.<s%>

<S%H4428>Now,<s%> behold, the king <S%H1980>walks<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H2204>you;<s%> and I am old and <S%H7867>gray-headed;<s%> and <S%H1121>behold,<s%> my sons are with <S%H1980>you:<s%> and I have walked <S%H6440>before<s%> you from my <S%H5271>youth<s%> to this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

Here I <S%H6030>am.<s%> Witness against me before <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and before his <S%H4899>anointed.<s%> Whose <S%H7794>ox<s%> have I <S%H3947>taken?<s%> Whose <S%H2543>donkey<s%> have I <S%H3947>taken?<s%> Whom have I <S%H6231>defrauded?<s%> Whom have I <S%H7533>oppressed?<s%> Of whose <S%H3027>hand<s%> have I taken a <S%H3724>ransom<s%> to <S%H5956>blind<s%> my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H7725>therewith?<s%> I will restore it to you."
They <S%H559>said,<s%> "You have not <S%H6231>defrauded<s%> <S%H7533>us,<s%> nor oppressed <S%H3947>us,<s%> neither have you taken <S%H3972>anything<s%> of any <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand.<s%>"

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3068>them,<s%> "Yahweh is <S%H5707>witness<s%> against <S%H4899>you,<s%> and his anointed is <S%H5707>witness<s%> this <S%H3117>day,<s%> that you have not <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3972>anything<s%> in my <S%H3027>hand.<s%>" They <S%H559>said,<s%> "He is <S%H5707>witness.<s%>"

<S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> "It is <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> who <S%H6213>appointed<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and that <S%H5927>brought<s%> your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

Now therefore stand <S%H3320>still,<s%> that I may <S%H8199>plead<s%> with you <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> concerning all the righteous <S%H6666>acts<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> which he <S%H6213>did<s%> to you and to your <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

"When <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> had <S%H935>come<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H2199>cried<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> then <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> who brought your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and made them to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in this <S%H4725>place.<s%>

"But they <S%H7911>forgot<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> their <S%H430>God;<s%> and he <S%H4376>sold<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H5516>Sisera,<s%> <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H6635>army<s%> of <S%H2674>Hazor,<s%> and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab;<s%> and they fought against <S%H3898>them.<s%>

They <S%H2199>cried<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2398><s%> 'We have sinned, because we have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and have <S%H5647>served<s%> the <S%H1168>Baals<s%> and the <S%H6252>Ashtaroth:<s%> but now <S%H5337>deliver<s%> us out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of our <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and we will serve <S%H5647>you.<s%>'

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H3378>Jerubbaal,<s%> and <S%H917>Bedan,<s%> and <S%H3316>Jephthah,<s%> and <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> and <S%H5337>delivered<s%> you out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of your <S%H341>enemies<s%> on every <S%H5439>side;<s%> and you <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H983>safety.<s%>

"When you <S%H7200>saw<s%> that <S%H5176>Nahash<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> against <S%H559>you,<s%> you said to <S%H4428>me,<s%> 'No, but a king shall <S%H4427>reign<s%> over <S%H3068>us;<s%>' when Yahweh your <S%H430>God<s%> was your <S%H4428>king.<s%>
Now therefore see the <S%H4428>king<s%> whom you have <S%H977>chosen,<s%> and whom you have <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H3068>for:<s%> and behold, Yahweh has <S%H5414>set<s%> a king over <S%H4428>you.<s%>

If you will <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H8085>him,<s%> and listen to his <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and not <S%H4784>rebel<s%> against the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> then both you and also the <S%H4428>king<s%> who <S%H4427>reigns<s%> over you are <S%H310>followers<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

But if you will not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> but <S%H4784>rebel<s%> against the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> then will the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> be against <S%H1>you,<s%> as it was against your fathers.
"Now <S%H1571>therefore<s%> <S%H3320>stand<s%> still and <S%H7200>see<s%> this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1697>thing,<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H6213>do<s%> before your <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

<S%H2406>Isn't<s%> it wheat <S%H7105>harvest<s%> <S%H3117>today?<s%> I will <S%H7121>call<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> that he may <S%H5414>send<s%> <S%H6963>thunder<s%> and <S%H4306>rain;<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> that your <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> is <S%H7227>great,<s%> which you have <S%H6213>done<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> in <S%H7592>asking<s%> for a <S%H4428>king.<s%>"

So <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5414>sent<s%> <S%H6963>thunder<s%> and <S%H4306>rain<s%> that <S%H3117>day:<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H3372>feared<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> and <S%H8050>Samuel.<s%>

All the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> <S%H6419>"Pray<s%> for your <S%H5650>servants<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> that we not <S%H4191>die;<s%> for we have <S%H3254>added<s%> to all our <S%H2403>sins<s%> this <S%H7451>evil,<s%> to <S%H7592>ask<s%> us a <S%H4428>king.<s%>"

<S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3372>"Don't<s%> be afraid. You have indeed <S%H6213>done<s%> all this <S%H7451>evil;<s%> yet <S%H5493>don't<s%> turn aside from <S%H310>following<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> but <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> with all your <S%H3824>heart.<s%>
<S%H5493>Don't<s%> turn aside to go <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H8414>vain<s%> things which <S%H3276>can't<s%> profit nor <S%H5337>deliver,<s%> for they are <S%H8414>vain.<s%>

For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will not <S%H5203>forsake<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> for his <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%>'s <S%H2974>sake,<s%> because it has pleased <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to <S%H6213>make<s%> you a people to <S%H5971>himself.<s%>

Moreover as for <S%H595>me,<s%> <S%H2486>far<s%> be it from me that I should <S%H2398>sin<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in <S%H2308>ceasing<s%> to <S%H6419>pray<s%> for <S%H3384>you:<s%> but I will instruct you in the <S%H2896>good<s%> and the <S%H3477>right<s%> <S%H1870>way.<s%>

Only <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> him in <S%H571>truth<s%> with all your <S%H3824>heart;<s%> for <S%H7200>consider<s%> how great things he has done for <S%H1431>you.<s%>
But if you shall <S%H7489>still<s%> do <S%H7489>wickedly,<s%> you shall be <S%H5595>consumed,<s%> both you and your <S%H4428>king.<s%>"
